title: We should open up 3v3 flex ranked all the time like we did at the end of last season
body: We should open up 3v3 flex ranked all the time like we did at the end of last season, there's less than two weeks left of season left now, and im sure people want to try for gold in this queue

replies.body: They still have to maintain queue health though. Bad queue health will snowball the effect, so it's not something anyone would really want to risk.
